p.span: This industry is made for architects that sell all kind of architectural services such as feasibility studies, schematic design, design development, worksite follow-up, energy efficiency assessment.
Leads get created in the CRM by filling the "Contact us" form of the website or manually by the salesperson.

Automated actions have been created to create activities at appropriated times (an action to call the lead is created when there's a new opportunity, a to-do action is generated when the opportunity is at the "needs analysis stage", a reminder and activity to cancel opportunity are created when the quotation is sent)

From the opportunity, a quote can simply be created using the "create quote" button, and using one of the pre-created quotation template (services and quantities can be suited to the client's request)
A set of architectural services have already been created and can be edited to match the architects' services.
Thanks to the services configuration, a project gets created automatically once the quote is confirmed by the customer. A set of tasks are created in this project, based on the sale order lines.
There is also a map view for the projects (projects are assigned a partner based on the projects location, either with the address or with the geolocation if there's no assigned address yet)
